* Bidder 1, starting with $20000, has won 4 items in this auction, with a total profit of $11800.:

  * Won Apparatus H at $3200 over $3000, with a true value of $6000.
  * Won Mechanism J at $5000 over $4000, with a true value of $8000.
  * Won Implement G at $3500 over $3000, with a true value of $6000.
